_header: Madame as the noble Alphonse king
Subjects: pageant verses; occasional verse; Arthur, prince of Wales; Catherine of Aragon
_description: ‘The speche of Boecius’ at the pageant celebrating the marriage of Prince Arthur to Princess Catherine — three stanzas rhyme royal

BLCottVitAXVI.First Lines: Madame as the noble Alphons kynghath evidently shewed by good argument…
BLCottVitAXVI.Last Lines: …Astronomer philysopher & devyneyou to be ioyned & so we all determyne
